official_title: A resolution to authorize Mary Lou Jardine, in the office of Senator Inouye, to appear as a witness in the case of United States against Choy.

summary.text: Authorizes Mary Lou Jardine, in the office of Senator Inouye, to appear as a witness in the case of United States against Choy.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize Mary Lou Jardine, in the office of Senator Inouye, to appear as a witness in the case of United States against Choy.
